# GetDecibelValue

**Instance Method**

Gets the decibel value of the level control.

## Declaration

```swift
float GetDecibelValue();
```

## Return Value

The decibel value of the level control.

## Accessing the Value

- **SetScalarValue**: Sets the scalar value of the level control.
- **GetScalarValue**: Gets the scalar value of the level control.
- **SetDecibelValue**: Sets the decibel value of the level control.
